title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 406: Featuring Bernie Nicholls
description:
On Episode 406 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Bernie Nicholls. The NHL legend joined (18:07) to discuss playing with Wayne Gretzky and being his right hand man, getting traded for Mark Messier, and some crazy prank stories. The guys also discuss The House of Dragons, New York Fashion Week, the NFL and more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
